articles.author: Kristina Killgrove
articles.title: 1st wheel was invented 6,000 years ago in the Carpathian Mountains, modeling study suggests - Livescience.com
articles.description: It's possible that the wheel was invented by copper miners in the Carpathian Mountains up to 6,000 years ago, according to a modeling study that uses techniques from structural mechanics.
articles.content: Even though the invention of the wheel around 6,000 years ago revolutionized everything from transportation to pottery making, its exact origins are still a mystery to archaeologists. But a new study… [+5017 chars]

articles.author: Samuel Axon
articles.title: Anthropic publicly releases AI tool that can take over the user’s mouse cursor - Ars Technica
articles.description: Anthropic is one of the first to go beyond just screen vision.
